Document.name: True Mosaics Studio: INTERNATIONAL MOSAIC TOUR
Document.description: Take a tour of public mosaic work by Laurel True/ True Mosaics Studio and The Global Mosaic Project. Map contains over a hundred public projects, in over 80 locations.

Placemark.name: Velocity Circus Museum
Placemark.description:
225 San Leandro Way (by Appointment Only)
Over 25 interior and exterior
architectural mosaics throughout
Museum, including floors, walls,
ceilings, 2 bathrooms, kitchen
backsplashes, maze hallway, inset
furniture, windows insets and doors,
patios, stairs and UFO landing pad on
roof. 2000- 2013.

Placemark.name: L'Hopital Universitairre de Mirebalais

Placemark.name: Pediatric Ward and Children's Playroom at Mirebalais Hospital
Placemark.description:
Mirebalais Hospital, Haiti.
Over 18 separate mosaic projects including murals, wall treatments, signage and decorative elements.
Cross-cultural design development project for the pediatric ward with schoolchildren from Mirebalais and Los Angeles, California. In partnership with the Global Mosaic Project
Over 100 artists from the US, France and Haiti contributed elements to this project.
Major production assistance by Mario Jeudi, Osner Jean Louis, Denis Bolivard, Cassius Smith and Johnsky Chrispin. 2012
